document.heading: Real Property Disposition Economic Analysis Amendment Act of 2006

history.narrative: Law 16-112, the “Real Property Disposition Economic Analysis Amendment Act of 2006”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 16-479 which was referred to the Committee on Government Operations. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on February 7, 2006, and March 7, 2006, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on March 23, 2006, it was assigned Act No. 16-314 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 16-112 became effective on June 8, 2006.
